cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4.0)

set (projectName "imgui")
message (${projectName})


# low level core
file(GLOB CPP_SOURCE *.cpp)
file(GLOB HEADERS *.h)

add_library(${projectName} STATIC ${CPP_SOURCE})
